comingle.comms.receiver

Class ReceiverDaemon<Data extends java.io.Serializable,Addr>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • comingle.comms.receiver.ReceiverDaemon<Data,Addr>
  • Type Parameters:
    Data -
    Addr -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MulticastReceiverDaemon, SocketReceiverDaemon

    public abstract class ReceiverDaemon<Data extends java.io.Serializable,Addr>
extends java.lang.Thread
    Abstract class of a daemon thread created by a DataPipe, whose sole purpose is to receive data for its creator DataPipe.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam

    • Method Detail

      • addDataReceivedListener

        public void addDataReceivedListener(DataReceivedListener<Data,Addr> dr_listener)
        Add a data received listener. Listener operations will be invoked every time data is received by this network socket.
        Parameters:
        dr_listener - the listener to add.

      • setExceptionListener

        public void setExceptionListener(ExceptionListener except_listener)
        Set a exception listener to this network socket. This listener operation will be invoked each time this socket throws an exception.
        Parameters:
        except_listener - the listener to set.

      • flagNotProceed

        public void flagNotProceed()
        Inform the receiver daemon process to stop.
